scripts.dev: rollup src/main.js --format iife --file public/main.js --watch.include 'src/*' --watch --watch.onEnd='npm run reload'
scripts.reload: cat public/main.js tool/livereload_injection.js | node tool/inline.js  > public/index.html && md5sum public/index.html | cut -f1 -d' ' | node tool/reload.js > public/livereload_hash.js
scripts.build: rollup src/main.js --format iife | node tool/inline.js > build/index.html
